name: Dinobolt
description:
Dinobolt

Made in a week for DINOJAM1 for which the theme was Size doesn't matter and VimJam 2: Boss [8 Bits to Infinity] for which the theme was On the edge. 

How to play

- Jump from rooftop to rooftop, kicking baddies to get a high score

Controls

KeyboardGampadMove D / RightLeft-stick / D-pad Jump Space / W / Z / Up Bottom face button KickJ / Right Ctrl Left face button

Credits

Programming by lilou_cormic (purplecable.ca)
Game Design & Music by Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com)
Pre-made assets are credited in-game

Made in Unity 2020.3.18f1. Sounds with Bfxr.
Source code available on GitHub
